title: Koichi Ae
text:
is a former <a href="Japan">Japan</a>ese <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Playing career.
Ae was born in <a href="Hiroshima%20Prefecture">Hiroshima Prefecture</a> on April 15, 1976. After graduating from <a href="Chuo%20University">Chuo University</a>, he joined <a href="J1%20League">J1 League</a> club <a href="Gamba%20Osaka">Gamba Osaka</a> in 1999. He also played for <a href="Avispa%20Fukuoka">Avispa Fukuoka</a> (April - September 2000) and <a href="Kashima%20Antlers">Kashima Antlers</a> (June - December 2001) on loan. However he could not play at all in the match at all clubs until 2002. In 2003, he moved to <a href="J2%20League">J2 League</a> club <a href="Montedio%20Yamagata">Montedio Yamagata</a>. Although he played 4 matches in 2004, he could hardly play in the match until 2005 and retired end of 2005 season.
